lowTemperatureAlarm.title: Low Temperature Alarm
lowTemperatureAlarm.description: Indicates if the temperature is below the configured low threshold.

highTemperatureAlarm.title: High Temperature Alarm
highTemperatureAlarm.description: Indicates if the temperature is above the configured high threshold.

lowHumidityAlarm.title: Low Humidity Alarm
lowHumidityAlarm.description: Indicates if the humidity is below the configured low threshold.

highHumidityAlarm.title: High Humidity Alarm
highHumidityAlarm.description: Indicates if the humidity is above the configured high threshold.
